dishes.title: Classic Caesar Salad
dishes.text: Crisp Romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, shaved Parmesan, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

dishes.title: Vegetable Spring Rolls
dishes.text: Crispy rolls filled with fresh vegetables, served with a tangy dipping sauce.

dishes.title: Bruschetta with Tomato & Basil
dishes.text: Toasted baguette topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and balsamic glaze.

dishes.title: Caprese Salad
dishes.text: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and olive oil, drizzled with balsamic vinegar.

dishes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
dishes.text: Mushrooms stuffed with cream cheese, garlic, herbs, and Parmesan.

dishes.title: Chicken Skewers with Peanut Sauce
dishes.text: Grilled chicken skewers served with a rich peanut dipping sauce.

dishes.title: Garlic Bread
dishes.text: Freshly baked bread topped with garlic butter and herbs.

dishes.title: Tuna Tartare
dishes.text: Fresh diced tuna mixed with avocado, sesame seeds, and a light soy sauce dressing.

dishes.title: Fried Calamari
dishes.text: Crispy fried calamari rings served with a tangy marinara sauce.

dishes.title: Avocado Toast
dishes.text: Smashed avocado on toasted sourdough bread, topped with chili flakes and lemon.

dishes.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
dishes.text: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with a rich lemon butter sauce and seasonal vegetables.

dishes.title: Steak Frites
dishes.text: Juicy grilled steak served with crispy French fries and a side of garlic butter.

dishes.title: Chicken Alfredo
dishes.text: Creamy Alfredo sauce with tender chicken breast, served over a bed of fettuccine pasta.

dishes.title: Grilled Ribeye Steak
dishes.text: Perfectly charred ribeye steak, seasoned with sea salt and black pepper, served with mashed potatoes.

dishes.title: Vegetarian Lasagna
dishes.text: Layered pasta, ricotta cheese, spinach, zucchini, and marinara sauce.

dishes.title: BBQ Ribs
dishes.text: Tender, slow-cooked ribs glazed with smoky barbecue sauce, served with coleslaw and fries.

dishes.title: Margarita Pizza
dishes.text: Thin crust pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and a touch of olive oil.

dishes.title: Beef Wellington
dishes.text: Tender beef wrapped in a buttery puff pastry, with mushroom duxelles and a side of roasted vegetables.

dishes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
dishes.text: Spaghetti tossed in a creamy egg-based sauce with pancetta, Parmesan, and black pepper.

dishes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
dishes.text: Tender chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

dishes.title: Pina Colada
dishes.text: A refreshing tropical drink made with rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream.

dishes.title: Classic Mojito
dishes.text: Mint, lime, rum, and soda water, topped with ice for a cool and refreshing drink.

dishes.title: Lemonade
dishes.text: Freshly squeezed lemon juice, water, and a hint of sugar, served over ice.

dishes.title: Iced Coffee
dishes.text: Chilled coffee served over ice, with milk and sugar to taste.

dishes.title: Margarita
dishes.text: A classic cocktail with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, served on the rocks.

dishes.title: Strawberry Daiquiri
dishes.text: Blended strawberries with rum, lime juice, and a touch of sugar.

dishes.title: Apple Cider
dishes.text: Fresh apple juice served chilled or warm, with a cinnamon stick.

dishes.title: Hot Chocolate
dishes.text: Rich and creamy chocolate drink, topped with whipped cream.

dishes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
dishes.text: Warm, gooey chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

dishes.title: Cheesecake
dishes.text: Creamy cheesecake on a graham cracker crust, topped with fresh strawberries.

dishes.title: Tiramisu
dishes.text: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

dishes.title: Crème Brûlée
dishes.text: Rich vanilla custard topped with a crisp layer of caramelized sugar.

dishes.title: Lemon Meringue Pie
dishes.text: Tangy lemon filling topped with a fluffy meringue, baked to golden perfection.

dishes.title: Apple Pie
dishes.text: Warm spiced apple filling in a buttery flaky crust, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

dishes.title: Chocolate Mousse
dishes.text: Rich and smooth chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream.

dishes.title: Panna Cotta
dishes.text: Creamy Italian dessert served with a berry compote.

dishes.title: Baked Alaska
dishes.text: A layer of cake and ice cream encased in a toasted meringue shell.
